name: Cookie
title: Security Analyst
justification: This domain is hosting a phishing and task scam that impersonates legitimate recruitement service. Several users have contacted the recruitement firm with complaints of losing money in this classic task scam. The network has begun operating very recently. Please find additional evidence on https://webel.github.io/scamwatch[#domain-url]
comments: This site was observed as part of a campaign that began beginning of March, 2025.
